Graceful Restart (GR) is configured as follows:

[edit routing-options]
graceful-restart;

Likewise, non-stop routing (NSR) is enabled using the following configuration:

[edit chassis redundancy]
graceful-switchover;

[edit routing-options]
nonstop-routing;
Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.
